entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who is loud and has a strong reaction to the word 'weasel'. He is also shown to be aggressive towards Zacharias.

entities.name: zacharias
entities.description: Zacharias is described as someone who is being looked at aggressively by Ron. He flushes in response.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is supposed to be teaching lessons, but Ron and others are skeptical of his abilities.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is described as someone who is snarling at Ron's behavior. He defends Harry's ability to teach.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as someone who pulls out a metal instrument from Zonko's bag and threatens to use it on Fred.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who tries to move the conversation forward and get back on track.
